attributes.action: Politicians should not be given the oxygen of publicity through normal media channels.
attributes.additional_details:
Politics have sunk to such a low, that politiicians are not only trying to gain any media attention that they can, but also in the process are only scoring points off the oppostion, and in the process don't know when to stop, as they love the sound of their own voices.
Dedicated channels should be created for this purpose, newspapers, radio and television, so that the rest of the media can be unafflicted by them, and contain proper news. Those that still want to follow them still can without the rest of us having to.
